title: Star Guardian Ahri Release Date
body:
when is the star guardian ahri skin going to released? 
pls help me{{champion:103}} {{champion:103}}

replies.body:
I don't have a specific date I can give out just yet!  They are going to be released during this patch, so keep an eye on the League website or on the store for when it comes available!  Generally we try not to give hard dates because as with anything, we may need to spend a little extra time polishing it before its released, which may delay it.

Oh, also, a friendly reminder that Star Guardian Ahri is going to be a bit more expensive than the other ones at 1820 RP.  So plan accordingly!

We do know that its comming this Patch, but please dont tell me they're comming on the 7th september, thats just way too long when the skins are allready ready :(

I would love about an answer,Please!

Soraka should have gotten the Legendary skin. 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} 
 Any explanation for why she didn't?
Also, why is Star Guardian Ahri so toxic? Kinda Hypocritical don't you think?

> [{quoted}](name=The Engiwizard,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=bG3JeAxA,comment-id=00010003,timestamp=2017-08-29T19:37:23.163+0000)
>
> Soraka should have gotten the Legendary skin. 
> {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} 
>  Any explanation for why she didn't?
> Also, why is Star Guardian Ahri so toxic? Kinda Hypocritical don't you think?

i think her "popularity" and classic teenage girl in movies and crap in the academy years got a liiiittttllleeee into her head XD
Will there be a bundle price if so how much?
Broporo already told us 9/7 when the Invasion game mode comes out.
Leave it to Broporo to be a baws and just tell people when shit is going down.
It is the 7th and I cant buy them.  SA Standard time 4:35

Pls don't make us wait until the 7th just let us give you our money 
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
Ornn needs time to breathe I guess

when you have 3250rp since about 2 weeks
 and still have to wait till about september to have sg ahri and give my love sg miss fortune {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

I have to say that I have waited too long. The skins are ready in game already. I understand that it needs time to make advertisements and the website, however, it wouldn't need 2 weeks to release the skins. As a player I do not care about the gaps between patches, since you have already get those skins ready. We players are exited to get those skins, just release them in return to our passion.
